english.segment1: You are beautiful, you are beautiful. Jesus you are oh so beautiful. You are wonderful, you are wonderful. Jesus you are oh so wonderful
english.segment2: Chorus. And Im surrounded by you. And Im surrounded by you. Jesus you are oh so beautiful. You are beautiful, you are beautiful. Jesus you are oh so beautiful
english.segment4: Bridge: You speak for those who cannot speak. You are mercy to the poor and needy. Youre the bright morning star. Youre the sacrificial offering. The renewer of the mind. Youre the peace be still and Know. You saved this soul of mine. Youre the master the maker the sculptor
english.segment5: Majestic and powerful. Youre the radiance of Gods glory. Youre the final word from God to man. The laughter the poetry the plan. Youre the dove of peace. Lover of a sinner. You are beautiful, you are beautiful. Jesus you are oh so beautiful. You are beautiful
